steps: step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Hover over list item
step 3: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 4: Click on button
step 5: Click on label
step 6: Click on label
step 7: Click on button
step 8: Click on link '2' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 9: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 10: Click on input field 'email'
step 11: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 12: Click on input field 'receive marketing info'
step 13: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING'
step 14: Call function actionSequence 1
step 15: Click on div
step 16: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 17: Hover over list item
step 18: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 19: Click on button
step 20: Click on link '1' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 21: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 22: Hover over div
step 23: Click on input field 'email'
step 24: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 25: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 26: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 27: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
